thread.title: BRIEF-Fat Brands Expects Annualized Revenue To Exceed $18.5 Mln

title: BRIEF-Fat Brands Expects Annualized Revenue To Exceed $18.5 Mln
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Fat Brands Inc:
* FAT BRANDS INC - NOW EXPECT TO CLOSE ON HURRICANE ACQUISITION IN Q2 OF 2018
* FAT BRANDS INC - CONTINUE TO EXPECT ANNUALIZED REVENUE (NEXT 12 MONTHS BEGINNING IN Q3) TO EXCEED $18.5 MILLION
* FAT BRANDS INC - CONTINUES TO EXPECT ANNUALIZED EBITDA OF GREATER THAN $11 MILLION, OR $1.10 PER SHARE
* FAT BRANDS - EXCLUDING HURRICANE, EXPECT ANNUALIZED REVENUE FROM FATBURGER, BUFFALOâ€™S, AND PONDEROSA BRANDS OF $14 MILLION, RESULTING IN EBITDA OF $7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
